```{r}

library(palmerpenguins)

penguins <- penguins

write.csv(penguins, here::here("multi_language_bash", "penguins_dat.csv"))

print('Saved penguins_dat.csv')

```

```{bash}

mv penguins_dat.csv penguins_dat_from_r.csv

```


```{python}

import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns

penguins = pd.read_csv("penguins_dat_from_r.csv")

penguin_plot = sns.catplot(data = penguins, x = "species", y = "bill_length_mm")

penguin_plot.savefig("penguin_plot.jpg")

print("Saved penguins plot")

```
